body:
Yeah yeah, we all know, Valentines day is coming up, and none of us Gamers have a "date"!

Or do we? ;)

Post here whether you got one or not, and a picture if possible!

I asked mynameis_ashley because why not. Oh, and because the girl I like IRL is named Ashley.

replies.body: People, come on we are better this. Valentine's Day is not about that 1 special someone. It's about all your special people. Whether it be your Mom, next door neighbor, or even your dog. Please take this day to tell all the people you love what they mean to you as this is the true spirit for Valentine's Day. Have a Happy Valentine's Day.

replies.body:
As someone else said earlier in this thread, Valentines day isn't about getting roses, or stuff like that. It can be about helping Mum with that extra chore, going fishing with Dad, comforting your friend, playing with your dog, and also, showing your affection.
Happy Valentines Day, Avicadians :)
